body: The reason for making the declaration _before_ the StatementList (rather than say, with the beginning on the StatementList) is tools: A source completion tool that knows about declared variables ideally should recognize an implicitly declared variable as being declared even before the first statement of the StatementList (so we can add new code before the first statement and have the tool support it). go/types tracks declaration points precisely according to the spec, which in turn is used by such tools.
